articles.author: Sopheng Cheang, Grant Peck
articles.title: China’s leader ends Southeast Asia tour touting Beijing’s reliability vs. US tariff threats - AP News
articles.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping has capped a three-nation Southeast Asian tour in Cambodia by promoting Beijing’s reliability as the region faces U.S. President Donald Trump’s tariffs that threaten its export-oriented economies. In Vietnam and Malaysia, Xi empha…
articles.content: PHNOM PENH, Cambodia (AP) Chinese President Xi Jinping capped a three-nation Southeast Asia tour in Cambodia on Friday, promoting Beijings reliability as the region faces economic uncertainty due to … [+4703 chars]
